Bastion of Mental Clarity.name: Bastion of Mental Clarity
Bastion of Mental Clarity.flavor: You erect a psychic shield to protect your mind from assault, and you ward your allies as well.
keywords:
Close burst 5

Trigger: An enemy hits or misses you with an attack against your Will

Target: You and each ally in the burst

Effect: Each target gains a +4 power bonus to Will until the end of your next turn.
